code: import React from'react';import packagesEng from'../../api/packagesEng.json';import packagesRus from'../../api/packagesRus.json';import packagesUkr from'../../api/packagesUkr.json';import packagesGer from'../../api/packagesGer.json';import'./Packages.scss';import{useTranslation}from'react-i18next';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export var Packages=function Packages(_ref){var getStarted=_ref.getStarted,packagesRef=_ref.packagesRef;var _useTranslation=useTranslation(),t=_useTranslation.t;var arr=useTranslation();var packages;if(arr.i18n.language=='Eng'){packages=packagesEng;}else if(arr.i18n.language=='Rus'){packages=packagesRus;}else if(arr.i18n.language=='Ukr'){packages=packagesUkr;}else if(arr.i18n.language=='Ger'){packages=packagesGer;}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"Packages",ref:packagesRef,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"Packages__title",children:t('Packages.text1')}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"Packages__packages",children:packages.map(function(pack){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"Packages__package",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Packages__package-top Packages__package-top--".concat(pack.name),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{className:"Packages__package-name",children:pack.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"Packages__package-whom",children:pack.whom})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"Packages__includes",children:t('Packages.text2')}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"Packages__options",children:pack.includes.map(function(option){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"Packages__option",children:option},option);})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"Packages__btn",type:"button",onClick:function onClick(){return getStarted();},children:t('H.Getstarted')})]},pack.name);})})]});};
